mapper.select: SELECT mstr.NTT_NO, mstr.POLL_ID, mstr.POLL_NM, mstr.POLL_BGNDE as startDate, mstr.POLL_ENDDE as endDate, case when sub.POLL_STATUS is null then 'todo' else sub.POLL_STATUS end as status, case when cast(mstr.POLL_ENDDE as date) <now() then 1 else 0 end expired FROM COMTNBBSPOLL mstr LEFT JOIN COMTNBBSPOLLMANAGE sub ON mstr.POLL_ID = sub.POLL_ID and sub.USER_ID = #{authorization} ORDER BY mstr.POLL_ID
select NTT_NO, POLL_ID, POLL_NM, POLL_BGNDE as startDate, POLL_ENDDE as endDate, case when cast(POLL_ENDDE as date) < cast(now() as date) then 1 else 0 end as expired from COMTNBBSPOLL

with sub as ( select mstr.POLL_ID, mstr.QESITM_SN_LIST, mstr.QESITM_ANSWER_LIST, mstr.QESITM_ANSWER_IMAGE_LIST, mstr.POLL_STATUS from COMTNBBSPOLLMANAGE mstr where mstr.USER_ID = #{authorization} and mstr.POLL_ID = #{pollId} ) select mstr.POLL_ID as pollId, mstr.POLL_NM as pollNm, mstr.POLL_BGNDE as startDate, mstr.POLL_ENDDE as endDate, mstr.TEMP_SAVE as isSave, mstr.VOICE_SUP as isVoice, case when sub.POLL_STATUS is null then 'todo' else sub.POLL_STATUS end as status, sub.QESITM_SN_LIST as qesitmSn, sub.QESITM_ANSWER_LIST as qesitmAnswer, sub.QESITM_ANSWER_IMAGE_LIST as qesitmAnswerImage from COMTNBBSPOLL mstr left join COMTNBBSPOLLMANAGE sub on mstr.POLL_ID = sub.POLL_ID and sub.USER_ID = #{authorization} where mstr.POLL_ID = #{pollId}

select a.POLL_ID as pollId, a.QESITM_SN as qesitmSn, a.QESITM_SJ as qesitmSj, a.QESITM_ANSWER_TEXT as qesitmAnswerText, a.QESITM_ANSWER_IMAGE as qesitmAnswerImage from COMTNBBSPOLLQESITM a where POLL_ID = #{pollId}
mapper.update: update COMTNBBSPOLLMANAGE set QESITM_ANSWER_LIST = #{qesitmAnswer}, QESITM_ANSWER_IMAGE_LIST = #{qesitmAnswerImage}, LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM = now() where USER_ID = #{authorization} and POLL_ID = #{pollId}
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as userId, POLL_ID as pollId, QESITM_SN_LIST as qesitmSn, QESITM_ANSWER_LIST as qesitmAnswer, QESITM_ANSWER_IMAGE_LIST as qesitmAnswerImage from COMTNBBSPOLLMANAGE where USER_ID = #{authorization} and POLL_ID = #{pollId}
mapper.insert: insert into COMTNBBSPOLLMANAGE(USER_ID, POLL_ID, QESITM_SN_LIST, QESITM_ANSWER_IMAGE_LIST, QESITM_ANSWER_LIST, POLL_STATUS) values ( #{uniqId}, #{pollId}, #{qesitmSn}, '', '', 'progress' )
mapper.update: update COMTNBBSPOLLMANAGE a join COMTNMBER b on a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID set a.ST_YEAR = b.ST_YEAR, a.ST_GRADE = b.ST_GRADE, a.ST_CLASS = b.ST_CLASS, a.ST_CLASS_NM = b.ST_CLASS_NM, a.ST_NUMBER = b.ST_NUMBER, a.SCHUL_NM = b.SCHUL_NM, a.SCHUL_GRADE_CODE = b.SCHUL_GRADE_CODE, a.SCHUL_CODE = b.SCHUL_CODE, a.LAST_UPDUSR_PNTTM = now() where a.USER_ID = #{authorization}
mapper.select: select count(*) from COMTNBBSPOLLQESITM mstr where mstr.POLL_ID = #{pollId}

select a.NTT_NO as nttNo, a.POLL_ID as pollId, a.POLL_NM as pollNm, a.POLL_BGNDE as startDate, a.POLL_ENDDE as endDate, case when cast(POLL_ENDDE as date) < cast(now() as date) then 1 else 0 end as expired from COMTNBBSPOLL a where POLL_ID = #{pollId}
